about_the_game:
Return of the classic.


I am older and wiser than I once was. Thus, my developer commentary had to become older and wiser as well.

Do you long for the simpler days? The days of the original BUTTON? Well then long no longer. The original BUTTON: A game about pressing issues developer commentary is now available for you.

Unfortunately, the higher-resolution audio files have been lost to time. Hopefully the compressed audio will hold up your memories as fondly as it holds up mine.
